|-- de_dust2_sci_fi_beta --|

This map is based on dust2 just in a sci-fi version.
But as you can see i called it BETA.
That mean that i won't finnish it before i get some feedback on it.

Need feedback:
1. Is this a map that you like and look play able?
2. Idea's to what i can put in.
3. Some one that's good in design and lightning in Source SDK

Pleas notice also:
- This map is Decompile protected.
- All the roof's are illusion's so you are able to throw nade's and stuff like that right through it.
- The 2 closed door's on right side for T' spawn will open on E press and throwing nades. So you are able to cast nades on the other side.

That's all.

So i will watch this map's feedback each day from now on and hope for something that i can use.

Best regards.

Black Perl

|-- De_dust2_sci_fi --|

This map is a copy of the original dust2 map. So if you looking for some new stuff, you wont find any thing.

This map is only a retextures and door's ect. are replaced with some new one's (look pcture's).

ATTENTION: Every roof's inside is illusionary (thorw able), so nade's and stuff like that are still able to be cast past them.

Pleas don't forget to try my "De_dust2_sci_fi_speciel".

Download link: Coming soon... (Still building)

Special Thanks to TopHATTwaffle

Best regards
BlackPerl

CS:S Map: Bomb/Defuse name: de_dust2_remake_ver2 author: [RЖB] Blade clan: RumpelBumpel homepage: www.rumpelbumpel.de contact: mapping@rumpelbumpel.de Panoramic view of the map, just click in the screen and move around! thanks for creating this Panoramic view! ______________________________________________________ Hi dear CS:S-Gamer, after releasing first version of de_dust2_remake de_dust2_remake_final i had additional ideas in order to make the map even more realistic. I´ve integrated both helpful suggestions and experiences. My Objective was to shame the original and all remakes of de_dust2! After testing Map extensively by our clan "RumpelBumpel", I´ve released FINAL status. ...here some additional screens: Here are some facts and figures about the map "de_dust2_remake_ver2" : Altogether 31 new models... 70 new textures (including all normalmaps und partially specularmaps) but basically the same play expiry as it is known in the original map! In the screenshot gallery you can get some impressions of the map and selected models! If you want to get an idea of the realism and the game expiry, download and play the map! VERY IMPORTANT: You have to turn on the color correction in the option menu, under graphics. The map has a color correction entity, which brings up the real athmosphere! Credits: Special thanks to my Wingman Stubu, which spend a lot of time with testing the project. Further on thanks to: Herr Freimann, DA_KILLA, Muckel, Ibex, Richie, Rambob, Saxil and the whole rumpelbumpel´s! Yours Blade visit us at our homepage: www.rumpelbumpel.de

Remake of de_dust2 for Counter-Strike Source
------------------------------------------------------
Author: _Laur (popa_laurentziu@yahoo.com)
Thanks to Maf|a for informing me about the request of
the gamers to make this map for Source.

The map has been built from scratch, even if it is
almost identical to de_dust2 made by Valve.

------------------------------------------------------
Several things have been added to the map, some
of them are obvious, others could be hard to spot:
3 examples of things harder to spot.:
   --- the small hole that leads from the tunnel
     to Bomb B. You must destry the bricks to enter.

   --- to enter the house at "Long side" you must
     break the door.

   --- the wooden plank at the middle stairs
     has 200 hit points.. you can destroy it.
------------------------------------------------------
There is an insignificant bug at the CT base that
can easily be ignored for now.
Changed map de_dust2, under the night version with the addition of passages and rooms.

CS:S Map: 

de_dust2_remake by Blade 

clan: RumpelBumpel 

homepage: www.rumpelbumpel.de 


dear CS:S-Gamer, 
meanwhile I cannot count any more, how often I have already run through the known
counter strike Source Map "de_dust2"! Every time I had the same thoughts: 

Loveless, Angularly and not up to date!

Thus I took a heart and decided to give the Map a new form. 

In the past I noticed that "playing community" ,is too unflexible giving
new Maps a chance. Fact is the best known and most popular Map on Public-Severn is "de_dust2". 

The intention was to built a Map which can totally substitute the original map, 
without players must adapt themselves! 

The following aspects were the initial position to start:

- no new ways, doors or game-relevant Props 
- identical play expiry (that´s the reason for de_dust2 beeing the most popular Map) 
- the Map must also run on low level systems (no texture orgies) etc. etc. 

Now after some months the Map has reached the FINAL status. 


Name: de_dust2_remake_final






The Map is fully playable and concluded so far. 

My Objective is to shame the original de_dust2! 

Special thanks already to my Wingman Stubu, which spend a lot of time with testing the project. 


Yours 

Blade 


contact: blade@rumpelbumpel.de

Hi All,

I recently discovered that my last submission of the final version of de_dust2_pro actually contained the wrong bsp file (instead of the final version it contained the same version as the beta release)

I have no idea how this mix up happened, or how long it has been like that. I'm not sure if anyone got the final version, or whether some people did and it got changed later.

The beta version had some serious design mistakes that imo really spoiled the map. I decided the best thing to do would be to resubmit the map to give people the chance to get the correct file. For those who already have the correct final version then no harm done, and for those who got the beta version by mistake, here is a chance to see the real map.

Enjoy!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VC0220JGmiM&t=157s

With this project I have tried to adapt de_dust2 in a way that (as far as I know!) has not been attempted before. Even though it is probably the most played source map de_dust2 is often refered to as a nOObs map. Whether or not you agree with this opinion, it is sure that de_dust2 is one of the simpler more straight-forward counter-strike maps. de_dust2_pro is an attempt to make a more complex and technically challenging version of de_dust2, offering players new strategic and tatical possibilities whilst at the same time preserving as much as possible the character and personality of the original map. Appart from their sometimes impractical size, one of the flaws with the unlimited/extended type maps is that the extra areas and encounter spots tend to undermine the character of the original map. With de_dust2_pro I tried at all time to respect and preserve the elements that characterize and define de_dust2.

de_dust2_pro contains:

The enitre playable and walkable space of the original de_dust2, unchanged.
Six completely new areas mapped into the structure of the original map.
Full HDR lighting.
Over 50 custom-made models.
Custom textures and sounds.
Overview, soundscapes, nav map.
Sex.
Violence.
And fun for all.

Here is a video walkthrough of the map



http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_detailpage&v=vnfWGYBQ1qE

Although I didnt put in the map-name, this release (de_dustII_pro) is basically a beta version. I am hoping that players will try out the map and give me any feeback on things they think need changing or any problems they encounter.

This map has taken a huge amount of work, far more than I originally thought, in fact. I spent a long time optimizing and tyring to get the best FPS possible. I have basically had to rebuild the entire map. I am pleased with the result but I have had to be very aggressive with the optimizing and visibility. I have run a lot of tests on the map and have tried to find all the rendering errors (props fading too early, occluders etc) but its possible that I have still missed some. If you come accross any rendering glitches or problems please let me know.

Enjoy!

NOTE- I HAVE JUST NOTICED THAT THE FILES FOR THE BETA AND FINAL VERSION GOT MIXED UP FOR SOME REASON. THE FINAL VERSION IS NOW POSTED HERE IN THE DOWNLOAD.

Welcome to the final version of dust2 pro. You can see a walkthrough video here:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VC0220JGmiM

For people who played the beta version: I made some bad design choices in the beta version that play testing on a few servers quickly revealed. The biggest problem was all the tight spaces the player had to fit through to get from area to area, it was frustrating and disrupted the flow of the map. All that is gone, the player can now run between all the different areas, no need to crawl or jump through windows. Some extra new connnections have also been added between certain areas, opening up the map more, giving players more strategic choices and bringing into play more the "pro" areas of the map. I am hoping that this final version will be much more enjoyable and player friendly than the beta version.

For people who havent seen dust2 pro before: Welcome!! I hope you enjoy this map. The dust2 project is an attempt to make a totally original dust2 variation map, different to any other dust2 custom maps out there. Dust2 is one of the more popular CS maps but is often criticzed for being boring or a "noobs" map. The idea behind dust2 pro was to make a more techinical version of dust2, giving players more strategic possibilities and alternatives to dust2 original routes whilst staying withing the boundries and maintaining the objectives of the original map.

I hope that players will enjoy this map, any feedback will be much appriciated.

TO INSTALL: The .zip contains only one .bsp file (all custom content enbedded). Copy/paste the .bsp file to steam/steamapps/<USERNAME>/counter-strike source/cstrike/maps/

Dust2 Pro Contains:

64 spawn points (32 per team)
Custom models (over 60)
Custom sounds and soundscapes
Custom textures
Nav map
Custom Radar
Is Fully optimized
1 free grenade per team per round

Map made by Lex,
Dust2 Changelog:
- All bugs fixed.
- More FPS
- Added HDR
- Better play.
- More positions.
- Etcetera.

EDITED AND RETEXTURED BY: PunisherRCX

It's a night-version of the best Counter-Strike:Source Map ever. I changed the skybox into a beatyful nightskybox, changed the light of the map and fixed some bugs. Maybe you know de_dust2_night (without the "fix" in the end). I didn't made it. I think it's terrible. But back to mine. - My one has the original models of the de_dust2. The other night-version ist without models (very empty). - My one has a better skybox. - My one has a map-overview (the little map on the top). I think it's very important and nice. - I fixed some bugs - I have named the Zones In short: Try my map and you never want to play de_dust2 (at day) again. I hope you like it^^ PS: Of course it's playable with bots Like the real Dust2
Check out my other maps: de_italy de_compound aim_dust-stylez_v2 aim_ice-stylez_v2 aim_para-stylez_v2

NuclearFusion Presents
------------------------
Created on 12-19-2013
de_dust2_nightfall.bsp



Map Designed to provide a different tactic style to play the original map de_dust2. 

Tired of the same old blah dust2 map played on almost every server for millions of years... ? Well I got the comment from many people to create a little bit different version of dust2. After listening to them I realized maybe its time dust2 needs a little update. 

And for all the Snipers out there that like to use the Awp Sniper Rifle.
I believe this gun is save to say its not going to be too Over Powered for the map. Seems like every server I go in has the weapon restricted because of how players feel that it is unfair. I took that into hand and restyled the map a little bit. So for all of you out there that miss having the awp. You can because this map has changed. 


Darkness creates suspicion and intimidates anyone over a period of time being in it. Now put that with one of the best Counter-Strike Source Bomb defuse maps and you got yourself a even better map.  

-= About Map =-

1. Half lit areas. / Pitch Black Dark in some areas. 

2. Bomb Sites stay the same. But added Logos on exactly where you can plant the bomb. 

3. I Believe I balanced the map out very fairly. Each team has their own advantages. 

4. Hiding Spots / Ninja Areas

5. Higher FPS.

----------------------------------------------------------------

**Now Experience your favorite map ever better.**
Thank you for reading and I hope you enjoy the map.
**//////////////////////////////////////////////**

De_dust2_night by 7thGraal
